tests: X-ray of right shoulder (AP and lateral views)
follow_up: Schedule follow-up in 7 days if symptoms persist
Immediate follow-up if pain becomes severe or mobility significantly decreases
advice: Apply ice pack for 15-20 minutes every 4-6 hours
Avoid heavy lifting or strenuous activities involving the right shoulder
Perform gentle shoulder stretches as tolerated
Rest affected shoulder but maintain gentle movement to prevent stiffness
Stop any activity that increases pain
